MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:21PM in the LL13 postcode area of Wrexham following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:25PM on 8th March 2021
